title: Jonathan Ashworth – 2021 Comments on Vaccine Supply Issues
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jonathan Ashworth, the Shadow Health Secretary, on 17 March 2021.
content: People across the country will be anxious and worried that the booking of new first dose vaccination appointments will be paused from the end of March.

Matt Hancock needs to explain exactly what these supply issues are and what he is doing to resolve them. Trying to dismiss or downplay the legitimate concerns of anxious people waiting for a vaccine is simply not good enough.
